title: Internal Site Search
description: Used for internal site searches and includes all related search behaviors and details.

numberOfResults.title: Number of Results
numberOfResults.description: Count of the total number of search results returned.

productFindingMethods.title: Product Finding Method
productFindingMethods.description: The internal site search term value with merchandising binding. Will show what term was searched for immediately before viewing a product.

refinementValue.title: Refinement Value
refinementValue.description: Number of times an internal site search refinement has occurred.

refinementType.title: Refinement Type
refinementType.description: Captures the refinement type(s) applied to the search results (i.e. department, brand, price, in-store, review rating, color, material, etc.)

refinementInstances.title: Refinement Instances
refinementInstances.description: Captures when a search refinement action occurs.

resultsPageNumber.title: Results Page Number
resultsPageNumber.description: For paginated search results, tracks the page of results the visitor is viewing.

resultsPerPage.title: Results Per Page
resultsPerPage.description: For paginated search results, tracks the number of search results displayed per page.

instances.title: Instances
instances.description: Number of times an internal site search has occurred.

locationInPage.title: Location in Page
locationInPage.description: When multiple search boxes exist on the page, this value should be used to identify the specific location the user used to search

nullInstances.title: Null Instances
nullInstances.description: Number of times an internal site search has occurred that provided zero results.

postalCode.title: Postal Code
postalCode.description: Captures the zip code used for a search, if applicable

radiusDistance.title: Radius Distance
radiusDistance.description: Captures the selected distance of the search radius.

radiusType.title: Radius Type
radiusType.description: Captures the selected distance type of the search radius in either miles or kilometers.

term.title: Term
term.description: Tracks the internal site search term entered by the visitor.

autoCompleteClicked.title: Auto Complete Clicked
autoCompleteClicked.description: Indicates when a visitor uses a suggested/autocompleted search value to execute the search

autoCompleteValue.title: Auto Complete Value
autoCompleteValue.description: For autocomplete scenarios, users sometimes abandon their search and click a specific term from the drop down. This value is used to track the specific terms clicked

autoCompleteTypedValue.title: Auto Complete Typed Value
autoCompleteTypedValue.description: For autocomplete scenarios, users sometimes abandon their search and click a specific term from the drop down. This value tracks what the user started to type in order to generate the specific set of suggested search terms

searchType.title: Search Type
searchType.description: Captures the method of search being executed, if applicable. Examples could include a type-ahead search, directly-typed search, or any other type of custom search functionality a site might have.

sortType.title: Sort Type
sortType.description: Captures the type of sort applied to search results, i.e. best match, price, rating, etc.
